com.github.davidcarboni.cryptolite

Class HashMac

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.davidcarboni.cryptolite.HashMac

  • public class HashMac
extends Object
    Provides a simple way to generate a Hash MAC (HMAC) using "HmacSHA256".
    Author:
    David Carboni

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALGORITHM
      The algorithm used for computing HMACs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected HashMac(byte[] key, String algorithm)
      This constructor is protected so that, should you need a different algorithm (e.g.
        HashMac(SecretKey key)
      This constructor allows you to use a SecretKey to generate an HMAC.
        HashMac(String key)
      This constructor provides parity with PHP's hash_hmac("sha256", "message", "key") function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String digest(String message)
      Computes an HMAC for the given message, using the key passed to the constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • ALGORITHM

        public static final String ALGORITHM
        The algorithm used for computing HMACs.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • HashMac

        public HashMac(String key)
        This constructor provides parity with PHP's hash_hmac("sha256", "message", "key") function.
        Parameters:
        key - An arbitrary String to use as a key.

      • HashMac

        public HashMac(SecretKey key)
        This constructor allows you to use a SecretKey to generate an HMAC.

        NB The Key.getEncoded() method of the key should return a suitable byte array. This is the case for keys generated/unwrapped using Cryptolite.

        Parameters:
        key - An key, whose Key.getEncoded() method will be called.

      • HashMac

        protected HashMac(byte[] key,
                  String algorithm)
        This constructor is protected so that, should you need a different algorithm (e.g. if you're integrating with a system that uses different crypto settings) it is possible to create a subclass with different settings.
        Parameters:
        key - A byte array to use as the key.
        algorithm - This should normally be "HmacSHA256".

    • Method Detail

      • digest

        public String digest(String message)
        Computes an HMAC for the given message, using the key passed to the constructor.
        Parameters:
        message - The message.
        Returns:
        The HMAC value for the message and key.
